patch 8.2.2544: Vim9: error for argument when checking for lambda

Problem:    Vim9: error for argument when checking for lambda.
Solution:   Respect the skip flag. (closes #7887)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2544: Vim9: error for argument when checking for lambda · vim/vim@bc327cc
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2544: Vim9: error for argument when checking for lambda · vim/vim@bc327cc
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: error for argument when checking for lambda. Solution: Respect the skip flag. (closes #7887)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9cb577a68277d46cc1134ef1723e90ff5f1d1b5c|patch 8.2.2543: Vim9: a return inside try/catch does not restore prop…>
patch 8.2.2543: Vim9: a return inside try/catch does not restore properly

Problem:    Vim9: a return inside try/catch does not restore exception state
            properly.
Solution:   When there is no ":finally" jump to ":endtry". (closes #7882)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2543: Vim9: a return inside try/catch does not restore prop… · vim/vim@9cb577a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2543: Vim9: a return inside try/catch does not restore prop… · vim/vim@9cb577a
attachments.text: …erly Problem: Vim9: a return inside try/catch does not restore exception state properly. Solution: When there is no ":finally" jump to ":endtry". (closes #7882)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/41f0895c6e3c7b921e3c102ad42be52b1be48018|patch 8.2.2542: highlight of char beyond line end is not correct>
patch 8.2.2542: highlight of char beyond line end is not correct

Problem:    Highlight of char beyond line end is not correct. (Chuan Wei Foo)
Solution:   Fix counting NUL as one cell.  Draw one more character if the EOL
            is part of the match. (closes #7883)
